title: Your favorite typeface
content: I was recently asked which is my favorite typeface and I wasn't sure what to answer... Do you have an odds-on favorite font?
author: missha

comments.content: What do you use in your web browser?

Nobel

Guerrizmo+Design  
No man is an island unto himself\_John Donne

Some of those were purchased quite a while ago. Took about 5 years to build. It can get quite expensive.

What kind of work does my workhorse do? Everything, really. From letters, to reports, to essays, etc.
How can you have more than one odds-on favourite?
